Firing from vehicles

Container.name: x20_BaseFallen
Container.participants: HELI B Tower;
Container.situation: the fia base was seized by the aaf

Key.Original: November, we've lost comms with the locals. Guess the AAF got to them first.
Key.Chinese: "November"，我們已與反抗軍失去通訊。我們猜阿爾蒂斯武裝力量應該已經先逮到他們了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 十一月，我们已与反抗军失去通信。猜测AAF应该已经先逮到他们了。

Key.Original: RTB. We'll sort it out.
Key.Chinese: 請返回基地。我們不過去了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请返回基地。剩下的我们来处理。

Container.name: x15_RoughLanding
Container.participants: HELI B Pilot;
Container.situation: player destroyed heli in rough landing

Key.Original: Could've done that a bit better.
Key.Chinese: 我就不能在做的漂亮點嗎。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我就不能再做的漂亮点吗。

Container.name: x10_Mayday
Container.participants: HELI B Pilot;HELI B Tower;
Container.situation: heli shot down

Key.Original: Mayday! Mayday! Mayday!
Key.Chinese: 求救!求救!求救!
Key.Chinesesimp: 求救!求救!求救!

Key.Original: November is going down! I repeat, we're going down!
Key.Chinese: "November"正在失去高度!我重複一遍，我們正在失去高度!
Key.Chinesesimp: "十一月"正在坠落!我重复一遍，我们正在坠落!

Key.Original: Copy, November. Dispatching search and rescue to your grid.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"November"。正派遣搜救隊前往你的座標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"十一月"。正派遣搜救队前往你的座标。

Container.name: x05_CargoDestroyed
Container.participants: HELI B Pilot;HELI B Tower;
Container.situation: one of the cargo has been destroyed

Key.Original: Uh... Eagle, November. Message. Over.
Key.Chinese: 痾..."鷹"，"November"。訊息。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 痾..."鹰"，"十一月"。信息。完毕。

Key.Original: Yeah, we've uh... Lost the cargo. Over.
Key.Chinese: 這個，我們恩...損失貨物了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这个，我们，呃...损失了货物。完毕。

Key.Original: We read you, November. Send it. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們收到了，"November"。請說。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们收到了，"十一月"。请说。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy, November.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"十一月"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"十一月"。

Key.Original: RTB. You get to explain this to Crossroads this time. Out.
Key.Chinese: 請返回基地。你自己必須親自向"Crossroads"解釋這一切。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请返回基地。你自己必须亲自向"十字路口"解释这一切。通话完毕。

Container.name: x01_LeavingAO
Container.participants: HELI B Tower;
Container.situation: player leaving ao

Key.Original: November, I'm reading you way off course. Suggest you adjust your heading ASAP. Over.
Key.Chinese: "November"，我發現到你正飛離計劃路線。建議你趕快修正你的航線。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "十一月"，我发现到你正飞离计划路线。建议你赶快修正你的航线。完毕。

Container.name: 40_InfantryDropped
Container.participants: HELI B Pilot;HELI B Tower;
Container.situation: right after player unloads the reinforcements (hot lz)

Key.Original: Eagle, November. Boots on the ground.
Key.Chinese: "鷹"，"November"。部隊已在地面上。
Key.Chinesesimp: "鹰"，"十一月"。部队已在地面上。

Key.Original: Copy, November. RTB.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"November"。請返回基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"十一月"。请返回基地。

Container.name: 37_Landed
Container.participants: HELI B Pilot;
Container.situation: player telling the troops to disembark when he lands at the base

Key.Original: Everyone out!
Key.Chinese: 所有人出去!
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有人下去!

Container.name: 36_HotLZ
Container.participants: HELI B Pilot;
Container.situation: player approaching hot lz

Key.Original: Approaching LZ.
Key.Chinese: 正靠近降落點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正靠近降落点。

Key.Original: Get set for landing. I'm gonna drop you right in the thick of it.
Key.Chinese: 準備好著陸。我將把你們投放在右邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 准备好着陆。我将把你们投放在右边。

Container.name: 35_InfantryLoaded
Container.participants: HELI B Pilot;
Container.situation: player checking if all troops are in

Key.Original: Welcome aboard, boys.
Key.Chinese: 歡迎登機，兄弟們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 欢迎登机，兄弟们。

Container.name: 30_ChangeOfPlan
Container.participants: HELI B Pilot;HELI B Tower;
Container.situation: new info received

Key.Original: November copies. Standing by.
Key.Chinese: "November"收到。等待中。
Key.Chinesesimp: "十一月"收到。等待中。

Key.Original: Solid copy. Changing course now. November out.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到。現在改變路線。"November"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到。现在改变路线。"十一月"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Change of plan, November. Standby for tasking.
Key.Chinese: 改變計劃，"November"。請等待接收任務命令。
Key.Chinesesimp: 改变计划，"十一月"。请等待接收任务命令。

Key.Original: Some locals took a Greenback outpost on the southern peninsula, and now they're surrounded. You're being re-tasked to help them out.
Key.Chinese: 一些當地反叛軍從阿爾蒂斯武裝力量那奪得了一個前哨基地，而現在他們陷入了包圍。你將被重新指派去協助他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一些当地反叛军从AAF手中夺得了一个前哨基地，而现在他们陷入了包围。你将被重新指派去协助他们。

Key.Original: Friendlies are waiting on the tarmac at the airfield. You are to insert them at the outpost to support the locals.
Key.Chinese: 友軍已在機場的停機坪等你。你將要運送他們去解救那些反叛軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 友军已在机场的停机坪等你。你将要运送他们去解救那些反叛军。

Key.Original: Expect a hot LZ. How copy?
Key.Chinese: 預計降落點是危險的。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 预计降落点是危险的。有收到吗?

Container.name: 25_StriderDropped
Container.participants: HELI B Pilot;HELI B Tower;
Container.situation: player has just dropped the strider at the lz

Key.Original: Eagle, November. Package delivered. Awaiting orders, over.
Key.Chinese: "鷹"，"November"。貨物已送達。正等待命令，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "鹰"，"十一月"。货物已送达。正等待命令，完毕。

Key.Original: Roger that. November out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。"November"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。"十一月"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Copy, November. Proceed to Whiskey.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"November"。請前往"威士忌"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"十一月"。请前往"威士忌"。

Container.name: 20_StriderLoaded
Container.participants: HELI B Pilot;HELI B Tower;
Container.situation: player has just loaded the floating strider

Key.Original: Eagle, November. We've got one MRAP in tow, proceeding to Pyrgos. Over.
Key.Chinese: "鷹"，"November"。我們已掛起一臺載具了，正前往皮爾戈斯。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "鹰"，"十一月"。我们已挂起一辆防地雷反伏击车了，正前往皮尔戈斯。完毕。

Key.Original: Understood. November out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。"November"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。"十一月"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Understood, November.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"November"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"十一月"。

Key.Original: Recommend you approach from the north-west. That'll take you around the taller obstacles nearby.
Key.Chinese: 建議你從西北方靠近。這條路線可以閃避大多障礙物。
Key.Chinesesimp: 建议你从西北方靠近。这条路线可以闪避大多障碍物。

Key.Original: Ground staff will deploy green smoke to mark the LZ.
Key.Chinese: 地勤人員將會在投放點施放綠色煙霧彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 地勤人员将会在投放点施放绿色烟雾弹。

Container.name: 17_Confirm
Container.participants: HELI B Pilot;HELI B Tower;
Container.situation: confirming new task

Key.Original: Solid copy. En route. November out.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到。在路上了。"November"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到。在路上了。"十一月"通话完毕。

Key.Original: It's gonna be a long day...
Key.Chinese: 這將會是漫長的一天...
Key.Chinesesimp: 这将会是漫长的一天...

Container.name: 16_NewTask
Container.participants: HELI B Pilot;HELI B Tower;
Container.situation: player receives his new task

Key.Original: November, be advised, tasking to follow.
Key.Chinese: "November"，請注意，請遵照以下任務指示。
Key.Chinesesimp: "十一月"，请注意，请遵照以下任务指示。

Key.Original: We've got an AAF MRAP stuck in the Gulf of Pyrgos. Crossroads wants you to deliver it to Pyrgos for inspection.
Key.Chinese: 一輛阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的載具被困在皮爾戈斯灣裡。"Crossroads"想要你運送他到皮爾戈斯進行檢查。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一辆AAF的防地雷反伏击车被困在皮尔戈斯湾里。"十字路口"想要你把它运送到皮尔戈斯进行检查。

Key.Original: Recovery crews are already on station and have the crew members in custody. They'll assist with the pickup.
Key.Chinese: 上面的組員已經被我們的監管小組給羈押了。他們將協助你進行吊掛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 回收组员已经就位，他们的成员也被我们羁押。他们将协助你进行吊挂。

Key.Original: How copy, over?
Key.Chinese: 有收到嗎，完畢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 有收到吗，完毕?

Container.name: 15_AmmoDropped
Container.participants: HELI B Pilot;HELI B Tower;
Container.situation: player has just delivered the artillery ammo

Key.Original: Eagle, November. Package delivered.
Key.Chinese: "鷹"，"November"。貨物已送達。
Key.Chinesesimp: "鹰"，"十一月"。货物已送达。

Key.Original: What's the news? Over.
Key.Chinese: 有新消息嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有新消息吗?完毕。

Key.Original: Copy, November. Standby.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"November"。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"十一月"。请稍等。

Container.name: 10_AmmoLoaded
Container.participants: HELI B Pilot;HELI B Tower;
Container.situation: player has just loaded the ammo container

Key.Original: Eagle, November. Container's loaded, proceeding to destination. Over.
Key.Chinese: "鷹"，"November"。已吊掛貨櫃，開始前往目的地。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "鹰"，"十一月"。已吊挂货柜，开始前往目的地。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy. Keep me updated. November out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。請保持聯絡。"November"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。请保持联络。"十一月"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Copy. Boots on the ground will deploy blue smoke to mark your LZ.
Key.Chinese: 收到。地面部隊將會為你在投放點施放藍色煙霧彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。地面部队将会为你在投放点施放蓝色烟雾弹。

Key.Original: Be advised, I've got Crossroads on the line. He seems intent on re-tasking you after you make your drop. Figured you deserved a heads-up.
Key.Chinese: 請注意，"Crossroads"正在線上。看來他想等你完成任務後，重新分派新的任務給你。想必你應該是能夠勝任的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，"十字路口"正在线上。看来他想等你完成任务后，重新分派新的任务给你。想必你应该是能够胜任的。

Container.name: 05_TakeOff
Container.participants: HELI B Pilot;HELI B Tower;
Container.situation: player in helicopter, about to take off

Key.Original: Eagle, November. On station, preparing for takeoff.
Key.Chinese: "鷹"，"November"。準備完成，隨時可起飛。
Key.Chinesesimp: "鹰"，"十一月"。准备完成，随时可起飞。

Key.Original: November copies all. Heading out.
Key.Chinese: "November"完整收到。開始出發。
Key.Chinesesimp: "十一月"完整收到。开始出发。

Key.Original: Copy, November. Today's forecast - clear skies with a weak westerly wind. That's gonna run up at about 5 knots.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"November"。以下是今日氣象-天氣晴朗並帶有微弱的西風。風速最高為5節。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"十一月"。以下是今日气象-天气晴朗并带有微弱的西风。风速最高可达5节。

Key.Original: Be advised, you've got two friendly birds sharing your airspace. Flight levels between 350 and 650 feet.
Key.Chinese: 請注意，現在有兩架直升機與你共享同一個空域。飛行高度請保持在350至650英尺之間。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，现在有两架直升机与你共享同一个空域。飞行高度请保持在350至650米之间。

Key.Original: Ground staff report your destination clear. No trees, no poles, no powerlines.
Key.Chinese: 地勤人員回報你的目的地並無障礙物。沒有樹，電線桿與電線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 地勤人员回报你的目的地并无障碍物。没有树，电线杆与电线。

Key.Original: And that's all I've got for you at this time, November. How copy?
Key.Chinese: 以上就是我必須交付給你的情報，"November"。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 以上就是我必须交付给你的情报，"十一月"。有收到吗?

Key.Original: Copy. Happy trails.
Key.Chinese: 收到。祝旅途愉快。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。祝旅途愉快。

Container.name: 01_Prologue
Container.participants: HELI B Pilot;HELI B Tower;
Container.situation: at the base

Key.Original: Setting up now. Give us a minute.
Key.Chinese: 設定中。請稍等1分鐘。
Key.Chinesesimp: 设定中。请稍等1分钟。

Key.Original: November, status?
Key.Chinese: "November"，狀況如何?
Key.Chinesesimp: "十一月"，状况如何?

Key.Original: Copy.
Key.Chinese: 收到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。

Key.Original: Use your heavy transport helicopter to support NATO forces on Altis.
Key.Chinese: 使用你的重型運輸直升機來支援在阿爾蒂斯上的北約部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用你的重型运输直升机来支援在阿尔蒂斯岛上的北约部队。

Key.Original: FOB Whiskey, Central Altis
Key.Chinese: "威士忌"前線作戰基地，阿爾蒂斯中部
Key.Chinesesimp: "威士忌"前进作战基地，阿尔蒂斯中部

Key.Original: SHOWCASE: SLING LOADING - New transport helicopters, Sling Load Assistant, Logistical support
Key.Chinese: 任務展示:吊掛-新運輸直升機，吊掛輔助，後勤支援
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务展示:吊挂-新运输直升机，吊挂辅助，后勤支援

Key.Original: Transport the container to the current position of our %2self-propelled artillery platoon%1.
Key.Chinese: 運送貨物前往%2火炮排%1的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 运送货物前往%2自行火炮排%1的位置。

Key.Original: Deliver the Ammunition
Key.Chinese: 運送彈藥
Key.Chinesesimp: 运送弹药

Key.Original: DELIVER
Key.Chinese: 運送
Key.Chinesesimp: 运送

Key.Original: Collect the container of 155mm shells from %2the AAC airfield%1.
Key.Chinese: 在%2阿爾蒂斯空中俱樂部機場%1吊掛裝有155公厘火炮彈藥的貨櫃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在%2阿尔蒂斯空中俱乐部机场%1吊挂装有155mm 火炮弹药的货柜。

Key.Original: FOB Whiskey
Key.Chinese: "Whiskey"前線作戰基地
Key.Chinesesimp: "威士忌"前进作战基地

Key.Original: Collect the Ammunition
Key.Chinese: 吊掛彈藥
Key.Chinesesimp: 吊挂弹药

Key.Original:
We have successfully carried out phase two of our three-phase assault against joint AAF-CSAT forces stationed on Altis. The AAF have been split in two, with entire companies pulling back far to the north-east and south-east ends of the island. CSAT forces, on the other hand, seem to have disappeared entirely.

However, logistics continue to present an obstacle. With phase two culminating in the seizure of the main airbase, along with several surrounding Forward Operating Bases (FOBs), we stand prepared to overcome this obstacle.
Key.Chinese:
在我們對付阿爾蒂斯武裝力量-廣協同盟聯軍的三階段步驟中，我們已經執行到了第二步驟。阿爾蒂斯武裝力量被一分為二，一隊撤往東北方，另一隊撤往東南方。而另一方面，廣協同盟部隊就像是完全消失一樣。

然而，我們的後勤出現了點困難。在第二步驟的最後，我們控制住了主機場與周邊的前線作戰基地，導致我們的後勤補給分散，這必須是我們得想辦法克服的問題。
Key.Chinesesimp:
在我们对付AAF-广协联军的三阶段步骤中，我们已经执行到了第二步骤。AAF被一分为二，整连地撤往东北方和东南方。另一方面，广协部队就像是完全消失一样。

然而，我们的后勤出现了点困难。在第二步骤的最后，我们控制住了主机场与周边的前线作战基地，导致我们的后勤补给分散，这必须是我们得想办法克服的问题。

Key.Original: COLLECT
Key.Chinese: 吊掛
Key.Chinesesimp: 吊挂

Key.Original:
One of our self-propelled artillery platoons, positioned on the eastern coast of the Gulf of Pyrgos, has requested resupply. Your task is to transport ammunition from %2the AAC airfield%1 to their position.

Note: to compensate for the added weight of sling-loaded cargo, your fuel reserve has been limited. Should you require refueling, support forces stationed at %3the AAC airfield%1 are on standby.
Key.Chinese:
我們位在皮爾戈斯灣東岸的火炮排向我們申請補給支援。你的任務就是從%2阿爾蒂斯空中俱樂部機場%1中吊掛彈藥至它們的位置。

注意事項:為了平衡吊掛貨物的重量，你的油料將不會被加滿。假如你需要加油，你可以在%3機場%1找到待命中的地勤人員來為你補給。
Key.Chinesesimp:
我们位在皮尔戈斯湾东岸的自行火炮排向我们申请补给支援。你的任务就是从%2阿尔蒂斯空中俱乐部机场%1中吊挂弹药至它们的位置。

注意事项:为了平衡吊挂货物的重量，你的油料将不会被加满。假如你需要加油，你可以在%3机场%1找到待命中的地勤人员来为你补给。

Key.Original: Board your CH-67 Huron as the Pilot.
Key.Chinese: 搭乘你的CH-67"休倫"並擔當駕駛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘你的CH-67"休伦"并担当驾驶。

Key.Original:
1. Board your CH-67 Huron heavy transport helicopter.
2. Collect the ammunition from %2the AAC airfield%1.
3. Transport the ammunition to the %3artillery platoon%1.
4. Return to %4FOB Whiskey%1 and land.
Key.Chinese:
1. 搭乘你的CH-67"休倫"重型運輸直升機。
2. 吊掛在%2阿爾蒂斯空中俱樂部%1的彈藥。
3. 運送彈藥前往%3火炮排%1那邊。
4. 返回%4"Whiskey"前線作戰基地%1並降落。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 搭乘你的CH-67"休伦"重型运输直升机。
2. 吊挂在%2阿尔蒂斯空中俱乐部机场%1的弹药。
3. 运送弹药前往%3自行火炮排%1那边。
4. 返回%4"威士忌"前线作战基地%1并降落。

Key.Original:
Weather: Clear with good visibility.
Wind: West-to-East, 2-4m/s.
Key.Chinese:
天氣:晴朗，視野良好。
風:由西向東，風速每秒2-4公尺。
Key.Chinesesimp:
天气:晴朗，视野良好。
风:由西向东，风速2-4米每秒。

November - Your callsign.
Eagle - Control tower.

"November"-你的呼號。
"鷹"-塔臺。
Key.Chinesesimp:
"十一月"-你的呼号。
"鹰"-塔台。

Key.Chinese: 天氣預報
Key.Chinesesimp: 天气预报

Key.Original: Get In
Key.Chinese: 進入
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入

Key.Original: GET IN
Key.Chinese: 進入
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入

Key.Original: Transport the reinforcements to the %2besieged base%1 on the southern peninsula.
Key.Chinese: 運送援軍前往被%2圍攻的基地%1，它在南方的半島上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 运送援军前往被%2围攻的基地%1，它在南方的半岛上。

Key.Original: Deliver Reinforcements
Key.Chinese: 運送援軍
Key.Chinesesimp: 运送援军

Key.Original: DELIVER
Key.Chinese: 運送
Key.Chinesesimp: 运送

Key.Original: Despite suffering some losses, you have succeeded in providing critical logistics support to our forces on the ground.
Key.Chinese: 儘管有些許損失，但你仍準確的完成了任務，提供我們地面部隊重要的後勤支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管有些许损失，但你仍准确的完成了任务，提供我们地面部队重要的后勤支援。

Key.Original: Despite some surprises along the way, you have succeeded in providing critical logistics support to our forces on the ground. Unfortunately, you were not able to get to the locals in time.
Key.Chinese: 儘管沿路上有許多驚喜，但你仍準確的完成了任務，提供我們地面部隊重要的後勤支援。但不幸的是，你沒能趕上時間。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管沿路上有许多惊喜，但你仍准确的完成了任务，提供我们地面部队重要的后勤支援。但不幸的是，你没能赶上时间。

Key.Original: Despite some surprises along the way, you have succeeded in providing critical logistics support to our forces on the ground.
Key.Chinese: 儘管沿路上有許多驚喜，但你仍準確的完成了任務，提供我們地面部隊重要的後勤支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管沿路上有许多惊喜，但你仍准确的完成了任务，提供我们地面部队重要的后勤支援。

Key.Original: Pick up the reinforcements stationed at %2the AAC airfield%1.
Key.Chinese: 搭載駐守在%2阿爾蒂斯空中俱樂部機場%1的援軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭载驻守在%2阿尔蒂斯空中俱乐部机场%1的援军。

Key.Chinesesimp: 搭载援军

Key.Chinese: 你的直升機已被摧毀!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的直升机已被摧毁!

Key.Original: The Cargo was Destroyed!
Key.Chinese: 貨物被摧毀!
Key.Chinesesimp: 货物被摧毁!

Key.Original: You Failed to Follow Your Orders!
Key.Chinese: 你並沒有遵照命令!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你并没有遵照命令!

Key.Original: LOAD
Key.Chinese: 搭載
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭载

Key.Original: Return to %2FOB Whiskey%1 and land.
Key.Chinese: 返回%2"Whiskey"前線作戰基地%1並降落。
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回%2"威士忌"前进作战基地%1并降落。

Key.Original: Land at FOB Whiskey
Key.Chinese: 降落在"Whiskey"前線作戰基地
Key.Chinesesimp: 降落在"威士忌"前进作战基地

Key.Original: LAND
Key.Chinese: 降落
Key.Chinesesimp: 降落

Key.Original: COLLECT
Key.Chinese: 吊掛
Key.Chinesesimp: 吊挂

Key.Chinese: 吊掛"挺進者"
Key.Chinesesimp: 吊挂"挺进者"

Key.Original: Collect the Strider stranded in %2the Gulf of Pyrgos%1.
Key.Chinese: 吊掛停等在%2皮爾戈斯灣%1附近的"挺進者"。

Key.Chinese: 運送"挺進者"到%2皮爾戈斯%1來做更進一步的檢查。
Key.Chinesesimp: 运送"挺进者"到%2皮尔戈斯%1做更进一步的检查。

Key.Original: TT6: Runway Lap
Key.Chinese: TT6:跑道
Key.Chinesesimp: TT6:跑道

Key.Original: TT7: Hillside Groove
Key.Chinese: TT7:山溝
Key.Chinesesimp: TT7:山沟

Key.Original: TT8: King of the Hill
Key.Chinese: TT8:山丘之王
Key.Chinesesimp: TT8:山丘之王

Key.Original: TT9: Kiss the Ground
Key.Chinese: TT9:親吻地面
Key.Chinesesimp: TT9:亲吻地面

Key.Original: TT10: Kart Delivery
Key.Chinese: TT10:運送卡丁車
Key.Chinesesimp: TT10:运送卡丁车

Key.Original:
There are several special Check Point features: timeouts, on-ground requirements and omni-directionality.

Timeouts require you to keep your vehicle within the Check Point area until the timer runs out. This could be to force a hover or landing.

Normal Check Points require you to fly through them from the front to the back. Some Check Points don't have this requirement and can be entered and exited from any direction.

Some Check Points require you to be on the ground (landed). Note that you don't necessarily need to be standing still!
Key.Chinese:
以下有幾個特別的檢查點:計時，落地，指向性等檢查點。

計時類的檢查點你必須把載具停在檢查點的感應範圍內直到檢定結束。你可以使用懸停或落地來達到此一條件。

普通的檢查點你必須從進入點飛入，並從出口出來才算完成檢定。但有些檢查點並無方向的限制。

有些檢查點需要你降落才算完成檢定。(但你並不一定需要完全等到停止不動)
Key.Chinesesimp:
以下有几个特别的检查点:计时，落地，指向性等检查点。

计时类的检查点你必须把载具停在检查点的感应范围内直到检定结束。你可以使用悬停或落地来达到此一条件。

普通的检查点你必须从进入点飞入，并从出口出来才算完成检定。但有些检查点并无方向的限制。

有些检查点需要你降落才算完成检定。(但你并不一定需要完全等到停止不动)

Key.Original: Helicopter Check Points
Key.Chinese: 直升機檢查點
Key.Chinesesimp: 直升机检查点

Key.Original:
In some Time Trials you will be asked to sling load objects from one Check Point to another.

When arriving to such Check Point, you will be instructed to pick up the object.

Check Points between the pick-up and drop-off require you to still be carrying the object.

At the drop-off you can earn a bonus for dropping the object as close to the center of the Check Point as possible. A penalty is incurred for damage to the object.
Key.Chinese:
在某些計時賽中，你會被要求吊掛貨物從一個檢查點到另一個檢查點。

當飛過類似的檢查點時，你會被提示去吊掛貨物。

在吊掛點與投放點之間，你必須保持吊掛著貨物。

在投放點時，你如果投放貨物離檢查點的中心越近，你獲得的分數就會越高。但如果你損傷到了貨物，你會被扣分。
Key.Chinesesimp:
在某些计时赛中，你会被要求吊挂货物从一个检查点到另一个检查点。

当飞过类似的检查点时，你会被提示去吊挂货物。

在吊挂点与投放点之间，你必须保持吊挂着货物。

在投放点时，你如果投放货物离检查点的中心越近，你获得的分数就会越高。但如果你损伤到了货物，你会被扣分。

Key.Original: Helicopter Sling Loading
Key.Chinese: 直升機吊掛
Key.Chinesesimp: 直升机吊挂

Key.Original: A kart has broken down during a race at the Negades Speedway. Bring it back to base and junk another vehicle.
Key.Chinese: 一輛卡丁車故障停在内加澤斯的賽道上。把那個破爛玩意兒帶回基地裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一辆卡丁车故障停在内加泽斯的赛道上。把那个破烂玩意儿带回基地里。

Key.Original:
%1Consider flying Helicopter Time Trials using the Advanced Flight Model available in the game's options. You may shave off a few extra seconds.

%1In helicopters especially, don't fly directly towards a Check Point. Plan your path, anticipate the orientation of the next Check Point and line up in advance.

%1You will not be able to always fly your helicopter at maximum speed. Take inertia into account, burn off excess speed in time and please, mind the ground!
Key.Chinese:
%1使用高級飛行模式可能有助你減少更多計時賽的秒數。

%1在直升機的計時賽中，不要直接向你的檢查點飛去，仔細規劃，調整飛行方向，好讓你在過了這個檢查點後能迅速趕往下一個檢查點。

%1你並不能總是讓直升機待在高速的狀態下，你必須考慮到慣性。還有請你必須時時小心你與地面的距離!
Key.Chinesesimp:
%1使用高级飞行模式可能有助你减少更多计时赛的秒数。

%1在直升机的计时赛中，不要直接向你的检查点飞去，仔细规划，调整飞行方向，好让你在过了这个检查点后能迅速赶往下一个检查点。

%1你并不能总是让直升机待在高速的状态下，你必须考虑到惯性。还有请你必须时时小心你与地面的距离!

Key.Original: This special trial combines several special Check Points, where you need to hover or even land.
Key.Chinese: 此次計時賽結合了幾種不同的檢查點，有些會要求你懸停或是降落在地面上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 此次计时赛结合了几种不同的检查点，有些会要求你悬停或是降落在地面上。

Key.Original: Helicopter Tips
Key.Chinese: 直升機提示
Key.Chinesesimp: 直升机提示

Key.Original: In this trial your helicopter handling is put to the ultimate test. Complete tight turns, survive rapid descents and manage your RPMs well.
Key.Chinese: 在這計時賽中你必須發揮你所有的直升機技巧。完成急轉彎，快速應變和管理你葉片的轉速。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在这计时赛中你必须发挥你所有的直升机技巧。完成急转弯，快速应变和管理你叶片的转速。

Key.Original: You've damaged the cargo too much.
Key.Chinese: 你的貨物損傷過於嚴重。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的货物损伤过于严重。

Key.Original: With its spaced out Check Points across the Altian countryside, this trial blends high speeds and terrain following abilities. Watch out for wind turbines and power lines!
Key.Chinese: 此次的檢查點配合著地形所擺設，你必須準確的跟著它們飛越低空。請小心風力發電機與電線!
Key.Chinesesimp: 此次的检查点配合着地形所摆设，你必须准确的跟着它们飞越低空。请小心风力发电机与电线!

Key.Original: Helicopters
Key.Chinese: 直升機
Key.Chinesesimp: 直升机

Key.Original: This introductory helicopter trial consists of a simple loop around the airport's runways and taxiways.
Key.Chinese: 此賽道將帶你環繞跑道與滑行道，簡單的認識直升機計時賽。
Key.Chinesesimp: 此赛道将带你环绕跑道与滑行道，简单的认识直升机计时赛。

Key.Original: Fly helicopters through an increasingly challenging series of aerial courses. Split-second decisions, engine performance management and aerobatic maneuvers demand excellent piloting skills.
Key.Chinese: 使用並了解直升機的特性，這些賽道將逐一挑戰你的技術。舉凡瞬間應變，引擎管理，特技飛行等挑戰，這些都需要你使出你精湛的飛行技巧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用并了解直升机的特性，这些赛道将逐一挑战你的技术。举凡瞬间应变，引擎管理，特技飞行等挑战，这些都需要你使出你精湛的飞行技巧。

Key.Chinesesimp: 飞行

Key.Original: After their failed invasion of Altis, NATO forces are consolidating their forces around the AAC airfield and Poliakko. CSAT, on the other hand, have reinforced their positions at Neochori and are preparing to launch a major counterattack in the hope of driving NATO forces from Altis.
Key.Chinese: 在他們對阿爾蒂斯的入侵失敗之後，北約部隊開使鞏固他們在阿爾蒂斯空中俱樂部機場與波利亞科周邊的部隊。另一方面，廣協同盟則是在内奧霍里周邊養精蓄銳，準備發動一次反攻，期許把北約的部隊一舉踹出阿爾蒂斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在对阿尔蒂斯的入侵失败之后，北约部队开使巩固他们在阿尔蒂斯空中俱乐部机场与波利亚科周边的部队。另一方面，广协则加强其在内奥霍里地区的阵地，准备发动一次反攻，企图把北约部队一举踹出阿尔蒂斯。

Key.Original: Invading NATO forces defend themselves from a CSAT counterattack.
Key.Chinese: 北約必須抵禦住廣協同盟的反攻。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约登陆部队必须抵御住广协的反攻。

Key.Chinese: 卡塔拉基

Key.Chinesesimp: 建筑工地

Key.Chinesesimp: 波利亚科

Key.Original: Having successfully routed the AAF, forcing them to retreat to the north-east and south-east corners of Altis, NATO forces prepare to deliver the final blow. However, the AAF are far from defeated. As NATO prepare to launch their assault from Delfinaki, the AAF are consolidating their forces around Molos in the hope of stopping NATO in their tracks.
Key.Chinese: 在成功擊退阿爾蒂斯武裝力量之後，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量撤退到阿爾蒂斯的東北與東南方的角落，而北約部隊正準備對他們發動最後一次總攻擊。然而，想要打敗阿爾蒂斯武裝力量還遠遠早的很。當北約正準備對澤爾菲納基發動攻擊之時，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量開始鞏固莫洛斯附近的防禦，期望半路攔截北約的部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在被迫退却后，AAF退守阿尔蒂斯岛东北与东南方的角落，而北约部队正准备对他们发动最后一次总攻击。然而，要打败AAF还远早的很。当北约部队正准备对泽尔菲纳基发动攻击之时，AAF开始在莫洛斯周边组织力量，企图半路拦截北约部队。

Key.Original: Retreating AAF defend themselves from a NATO offensive.
Key.Chinese: 撤退中的阿爾蒂斯武裝力量必須抵禦住北約的攻勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退中的AAF必须抵御住北约的攻势。

Key.Original: Sofia
Key.Chinese: 索菲亞
Key.Chinesesimp: 索菲亚

Key.Original: Support 08 Sofia
Key.Chinese: 支援08索菲亞
Key.Chinesesimp: 支援08索菲亚

Key.Chinese: 澤爾菲納基
Key.Chinesesimp: 泽尔菲纳基

Key.Chinesesimp: 发电厂

Key.Chinesesimp: 太阳能发电厂

Key.Chinesesimp: 莫洛斯

Key.Original: Sofia
Key.Chinese: 索菲亞
Key.Chinesesimp: 索菲亚

Key.Original: For reasons that are, as of yet, unclear, AAF and CSAT forces have declared an immediate dissolution of their alliance and a commencement of hostilities. The capital of Altis, Pyrgos, remains a no-man's land, holding immense value to both sides. The AAF prepare to launch their assault from the north, while CSAT intend to counter from the south.
Key.Chinese: 不知為何，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量和廣協同盟突然宣布解除聯盟關係，並立即進入對立狀態。阿爾蒂斯的首都皮爾戈斯，仍然是塊無人之地，它的價值對兩邊陣營來說都是非常重要的。阿爾蒂斯武裝力量部隊打算從北方發動攻勢，同時廣協同盟也準備從南方發動攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不知为何，AAF和广协突然宣布解除联盟关系，并立即进入对立状态。阿尔蒂斯的首府皮尔戈斯仍然是块无主之地，它的价值对两边阵营来说都是非常重要的。阿爾蒂斯武裝力量部队打算从北方发动攻势，同时广协也准备从南方发动攻击。

Key.Original: CSAT-AAF relations have disintegrated. Both sides prepare to stake it all on Pyrgos, the capital.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟與阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的關係已經瓦解。兩邊都亟欲想獲得首都皮爾戈斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协与AAF的关系已经瓦解。两边都亟欲想获得首都皮尔戈斯。

Key.Original: Pyrgos
Key.Chinese: 皮爾戈斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 皮尔戈斯

Key.Original: Support 08 Pyrgos
Key.Chinese: 支援08皮爾戈斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 支援08皮尔戈斯

Key.Chinese: 礦場
Key.Chinesesimp: 矿场

Key.Original: Labelled an insurgency by the local government, the FIA have reveled in a string of victories against the AAF, seizing major ground in the process. The AAF have called upon CSAT for assistance. In response, elements of one of CSAT's elite Airborne Battalions have been deployed to the region to launch counter-insurgency operations against the FIA.
Key.Chinese: 當反叛軍自由獨立同盟正沉浸在對阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的勝利時。阿爾蒂斯武裝力量轉頭向廣協同盟請求協助。當作回應，廣協同盟的菁英空降營被部屬到該區，開始對自由獨立同盟執行反叛亂行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正当自由独立同盟沉浸在对AAF的胜利中时。AAF向广协请求协助。作为回应，广协的精锐空降营被部属到该区，开始对自由独立同盟执行反叛乱行动。

Key.Original: Members of an elite CSAT Airborne Battalion launch an offensive against the FIA.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟的菁英空降營開始對自由獨立同盟發動攻勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协的精锐空降营开始对自由独立同盟发动攻势。

Key.Chinese: 羅佐波利
Key.Chinesesimp: 罗佐波利

Key.Chinese: 支援04羅佐波利

Key.Chinese: 羅佐波利
Key.Chinesesimp: 罗佐波利

Key.Original: Months after Task Force Aegis went dark, the 111th Division have successfully commenced their invasion of Stratis with the capture of the Stratis Air Base. However, the rest of the island remains under AAF control, with defenses strategically positioned at all major installations. As a result, the 111th are coming at them from the north-west, supported by the FIA from the south, with the intention of catching the AAF off-guard.
Key.Chinese: 在”神盾"特遣隊失聯後一個月，第111師成功登陸了斯特拉蒂斯島並控制住上面的空軍基地。然而島上的其餘部分還是被阿爾蒂斯武裝力量控制住，包括主要的設施都被嚴密的保護著。為此，第111師打算從西北方發動攻勢，並在南方自由獨立同盟的幫助之下，希望能打的阿爾蒂斯武裝力量一個措手不及。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在"宙斯盾"特遣队失联后一个月，第111师成功在斯特拉蒂斯岛实施登陆并控制了岛上的空军基地。然而岛上的其余部分还在AAF手中，其防御主要围绕各重点设施展开。为此，第111师打算从西北方发动攻势，并在南方自由独立同盟的帮助之下，希望能给AAF一个措手不及。

Key.Original: The 111th Division launch their invasion of Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 第111師開始向斯特拉蒂斯島發動攻勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 第111师开始向斯特拉蒂斯岛发动攻势。

Key.Original: %2, be advised, %1 are on the ground. You are clear for take off.
Key.Chinese: %2，請注意，%1已在地面。你可以起飛了。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2，请注意，%1已在地面。你可以起飞了。

Key.Original: %1 are requesting transport.
Key.Chinese: %1正在請求運輸。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1正在请求运输。

Key.Original: %1 are reporting they are no longer in need of transport. Continue on mission.
Key.Chinese: %1已不再需要運輸。請繼續任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1已不再需要运输。请继续任务。

Key.Original: %2, be advised, %1 are boarding your helicopter. Standby for update.
Key.Chinese: %2，請注意，%1正在搭乘你的直升機。請稍待。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2，请注意，%1正在搭乘你的直升机。请稍待。

Key.Original: %2, be advised, %1 are on board. You are clear for takeoff.
Key.Chinese: %2，請注意，%1已全員上機。你可以起飛了。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2，请注意，%1已全员上机。你可以起飞了。

Key.Original: %2, be advised, %1 are non-responsive, presumed KIA.
Key.Chinese: %2，請注意，%1已無回應，推測他們已經陣亡。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2，请注意，%1已无回应，推测他们已经阵亡。

Key.Original: %1 are non-responsive, presumed KIA. Continue on mission.
Key.Chinese: %1已無回應，推測他們已經陣亡。請繼續任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1已无回应，推测他们已经阵亡。请继续任务。

Key.Original: %2, be advised, %1 are reporting negative on your LZ.
Key.Chinese: %2，請注意，%1回報你的降落點有危險。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2，请注意，%1回报你的降落点有危险。

Key.Original: There is a manpower cap for each side. This will determine when ground forces are replenished, and by how much.
Key.Chinese: 每邊都有人力資源上限。這將決定地面部隊有多少的人力可以補充。
Key.Chinesesimp: 每边都有人力资源上限。这将决定地面部队有多少的人力可以补充。

Key.Original: Making scheduled stops at the Maintenance area will help you to build up your Task Streak, rewarding you with stronger Tactical Strikes.
Key.Chinese: 請在維護區停等的時候制定你的任務計劃，這將帶給你更多強力的戰略打擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请在维护区停等的时候制定你的任务计划，这将带给你更多强力的战略打击。

Key.Original: Your helicopter will lock upon entering. It will unlock if the helicopter is put out of action, or if you land at the Maintenance area.
Key.Chinese: 你的直升機將在你進入後上鎖。除非直升機壞掉，或你降落在維護區時，他才會再度解鎖。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的直升机将在你进入后上锁。除非直升机坏掉，或你降落在维护区时，他才会再度解锁。

Key.Original: Leaving your helicopter in the Maintenance area and going for different helicopter is a valid option if you wish to try something different.
Key.Chinese: 如果你想嘗試點不一樣的方法，你可以把直升機留在維護區，並且去換一臺不同的直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你想尝试点不一样的方法，你可以把直升机留在维护区，并且去换一台不同的直升机。

Key.Original: Stronger Tactical Strikes require more Score to be accumulated.
Key.Chinese: 強力的戰略打擊需要賺得更多的分數後才能使用。
Key.Chinesesimp: 强力的战略打击需要赚得更多的分数后才能使用。

Key.Original: The type of the Tactical Strike and its coordinates are determined by HQ.
Key.Chinese: 戰略打擊的類型與座標，通通都交由總部來決定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 战略打击的类型与座标，通通都交由总部来决定。

Key.Original: The side Score has a direct gameplay effect. When it reaches a set threshold, the side HQ will issue a Tactical Strike.
Key.Chinese: 陣營的分數會對遊戲產生顯著的變化。當分數達到一個定額時，該陣營的總部將會開始提供戰略打擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 阵营的分数会对游戏产生显着的变化。当分数达到一个定额时，该阵营的总部将会开始提供战略打击。

Key.Original: Your Score measures how well you perform on the battlefield and is shown on the Scoreboard.
Key.Chinese: 你的分數將由你在戰場上的表現來做判定，分數會顯示在分數版上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的分数将由你在战场上的表现来做判定，分数会显示在分数版上。

Key.Original: Completing tasks will contribute to your Score and to the side Score.
Key.Chinese: 完成一項任務將會增加你自己與陣營的分數。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完成一项任务将会增加你自己与阵营的分数。

Key.Original: Don't try to capture sectors. Sectors can only be captured by ground forces.
Key.Chinese: 別試圖佔領一個佔領區。佔領區只能被地面部隊佔領。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别试图占领一个占领区。占领区只能被地面部队占领。

Key.Original: Medevac - where medevac'd forces are to be delivered.
Key.Chinese: 醫療後送-傷患必須送往的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 医疗后送-伤患必须送往的地方。

Key.Original: Maintenance - where helicopters can be resupplied.
Key.Chinese: 維護區-可在那邊進行補給。
Key.Chinesesimp: 维护区-可在那边进行补给。

Key.Original: Helipad - where helicopters will spawn.
Key.Chinese: 直升機停機坪-直升機將重生在那邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 直升机停机坪-直升机将重生在那边。

Key.Original: Each side's base is composed of 3 special areas:
Key.Chinese: 每個陣營的基地內將包含以下3種特殊的區域:
Key.Chinesesimp: 每个阵营的基地内将包含以下3种特殊的区域:

Key.Original: Complete tasks assigned during the game to further increase your score.
Key.Chinese: 完成分派給你的任務，將能進一步提高你的分數。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完成分派给你的任务，将能进一步提高你的分数。

Key.Chinesesimp: 运输

Key.Chinese: 把地面部隊運往任務區內。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把地面部队运往任务区内。

Key.Chinese: 運輸%1前往%2佔領區。你也可以把他們投放在任一不是我們的佔領區之中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输%1前往%2占领区。你也可以把他们投放在任一不是我们的占领区之中。

Key.Chinese: 運輸武器與彈藥給我們的地面部隊。補給箱將重生在維護區之中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输武器与弹药给我们的地面部队。补给箱将重生在维护区之中。

Key.Chinese: 撤離%1返回基地進行醫療救護。
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离%1返回基地进行医疗救护。

Key.Chinese: 提供密接空中支援給地面部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 提供近距离空中支援给地面部队。

Key.Chinese: 摧毀%1指定的目標載具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁%1指定的目标载具。

Key.Original: %1 are requesting a supply drop. Ground staff have supplies on standby at base.
Key.Chinese: %1正在請求運輸補給。地勤人員已在基地中準備好補給品。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1正在请求运输补给。地勤人员已在基地中准备好补给品。

Key.Original: %2, be advised, %1 are reporting a successful delivery.
Key.Chinese: %2，請注意，%1回報他們已收到補給。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2，请注意，%1回报他们已收到补给。

Key.Original: %1 have canceled their request for supplies. Continue on mission.
Key.Chinese: %1已不再需要運輸補給。請繼續任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1已不再需要运输补给。请继续任务。

Key.Original: The more sectors your side captures, the faster the enemy's tickets diminish.
Key.Chinese: 佔領越多的佔領區，將能更快的消耗敵人的人力資源。
Key.Chinesesimp: 占领越多的占领区，将能更快的消耗敌人的人力资源。

Key.Original: Win the game by bleeding the enemy of all of their tickets.
Key.Chinese: 耗光敵人的人力資源即可贏得遊戲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 耗光敌人的人力资源即可赢得游戏。

Key.Original: There are 4 ways pilots can support ground forces: infantry transport, supply transport, close air support and medevac.
Key.Chinese: 有4種支援地面部隊的方式:步兵運輸，補給運輸，密接空中支援與醫療後送。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有4种支援地面部队的方式:步兵运输，补给运输，近距离空中支援与医疗后送。

Key.Original: The battlefield is divided into multiple sectors that can be captured by either side.
Key.Chinese: 戰場被劃分成多個可被佔領的佔領區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 战场被划分成多个可被占领的占领区。

Key.Original: Players are not capturing sectors! Sectors are instead captured by ground forces.
Key.Chinese: 玩家無法佔領佔領區!佔領區只能交由地面部隊來佔領。
Key.Chinesesimp: 玩家无法占领占领区!占领区只能交由地面部队来占领。

Key.Original: Players act as pilots supporting ground forces with their helicopters.
Key.Chinese: 玩家僅能駕駛直升機來支援地面部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 玩家仅能驾驶直升机来支援地面部队。

Key.Original: Take sectors to bleed the enemy's tickets.
Key.Chinese: 奪取佔領區來消耗敵人的人力資源。
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取占领区来消耗敌人的人力资源。

Key.Original: Unloading Interrupted
Key.Chinese: 卸載中斷
Key.Chinesesimp: 卸载中断

Key.Original: Unloading Completed
Key.Chinese: 卸載完成
Key.Chinesesimp: 卸载完成

Key.Original: Unloading...
Key.Chinese: 卸載中...
Key.Chinesesimp: 卸载中...

Key.Original: Transporting Ammo Interrupted
Key.Chinese: 補給彈藥中斷
Key.Chinesesimp: 补给弹药中断

Key.Original: Transporting Ammo Completed
Key.Chinese: 補給彈藥完成
Key.Chinesesimp: 补给弹药完成

Key.Original: Transporting Ammo...
Key.Chinese: 補給彈藥中...
Key.Chinesesimp: 补给弹药中...

Key.Original: Resupply Interrupted
Key.Chinese: 補給中斷
Key.Chinesesimp: 补给中断

Key.Original: Resupply Completed
Key.Chinese: 補給完成
Key.Chinesesimp: 补给完成

Key.Original: Repairing...
Key.Chinese: 維修中...
Key.Chinesesimp: 维修中...

Key.Original: Refueling...
Key.Chinese: 加油中...
Key.Chinesesimp: 加油中...

Key.Original: Rearming %1...
Key.Chinese: 重新武裝%1...
Key.Chinesesimp: 重新武装%1...

Key.Original: Rearming...
Key.Chinese: 重新武裝中...
Key.Chinesesimp: 重新武装中...

Key.Original: Loading Interrupted
Key.Chinese: 裝載中斷
Key.Chinesesimp: 装载中断

Key.Original: Loading Completed
Key.Chinese: 裝載完成
Key.Chinesesimp: 装载完成

Key.Original: Loading...
Key.Chinese: 裝載中...
Key.Chinesesimp: 装载中...

Key.Original: Priority. %1 are requesting medevac.
Key.Chinese: 緊急優先。%1正在請求醫療後送。
Key.Chinesesimp: 紧急优先。%1正在请求医疗后送。

Key.Original: %1 are non-responsive, presumed KIA. Medevac no longer required.
Key.Chinese: %1已無回應，推測他們已經陣亡。醫療後送已不再需要。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1已无回应，推测他们已经阵亡。医疗后送已不再需要。

Key.Original: The enemy is capturing %3.
Key.Chinese: 敵軍正在佔領%3。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军正在占领%3。

Key.Original: The enemy have captured %3.
Key.Chinese: 敵軍佔領了%3。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军占领了%3。

Key.Original: %3 is almost under friendly control.
Key.Chinese: %3幾乎在我們的掌控之下。
Key.Chinesesimp: %3几乎在我们的掌控之下。

Key.Original: Friendly forces have captured %3.
Key.Chinese: 友軍已佔領%3。
Key.Chinesesimp: 友军已占领%3。

Key.Original: Priority. %1 are requesting immediate close air support.
Key.Chinese: 緊急優先。%1正在請求立即的密接空中支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 紧急优先。%1正在请求立即的近距离空中支援。

Key.Original: %1 are non-responsive, presumed KIA. CAS no longer required. Continue on mission.
Key.Chinese: %1已無回應，推測他們已經陣亡。密接空中支援已不再需要。請繼續任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1已无回应，推测他们已经阵亡。近距离空中支援已不再需要。请继续任务。

Key.Original: %2, good effect on target. Out.
Key.Chinese: %2，打擊效果顯著。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2，打击效果显着。通话完毕。

Key.Original: %1 have canceled their request for CAS. Continue on mission.
Key.Chinese: %1已經取消密接空中支援的請求。請繼續任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1已经取消近距离空中支援的请求。请继续任务。

Key.Original: CAS Request
Key.Chinese: 密接空中支援請求
Key.Chinesesimp: 近距离空中支援请求

Key.Original: A Close-Air-Support request was registered and a new task was added. To complete the task, destroy the enemy vehicle marked by the waypoint.
Key.Chinese: 收到一個新的密接空中支援請求，該任務已被新增。請前往標記的路徑點摧毀敵方載具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到一个新的近距离空中支援请求，该任务已被新增。请前往标记的路径点摧毁敌方载具。

Key.Original: This is a high priority task as the vehicle can decimate several units if it's not quickly dispatched. This task has the highest Score reward.
Key.Chinese: 這項任務為高優先級別，因為敵方載具極有可能使我們地面部隊損失慘重。此項任務有高額的分數獎勵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这项任务为高优先级别，因为敌方载具极有可能使我们地面部队损失惨重。此项任务有高额的分数奖励。

Key.Original: Crash Landing
Key.Chinese: 緊急迫降
Key.Chinesesimp: 紧急迫降

Key.Original: You have survived, but your helicopter is out of action. Because you were not killed in the crash, you do not receive the score penalty for dying. As a bonus, your respawn time has also been decreased.
Key.Chinese: 你倖存下來了，但你的直升機已經損毀。因為你沒有在摔機中喪生，所以你並不會被扣分數。而且你的重生秒數將會下降。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你幸存下来了，但你的直升机已经损毁。因为你没有在摔机中丧生，所以你并不会被扣分数。而且你的重生秒数将会下降。

Key.Original: Group Markers
Key.Chinese: 小隊標記
Key.Chinesesimp: 小队标记

Key.Original:
By pressing %11 you can toggle group markers on friendly units. The group markers consist of several elements:
%2 middle - unit type.
%2 left - request type.
%2 right - selected by player.
Key.Chinese:
按下%11即可切換開啟友軍的小隊標記。小組標記的內容如下:
%2中間-單位類型。
%2左邊-請求的類型。
%2右邊-由哪個玩家負責執行。
Key.Chinesesimp:
按下%11即可切换开启友军的小队标记。小组标记的内容如下:
%2中间-单位类型。
%2左边-请求的类型。
%2右边-由哪个玩家负责执行。

Key.Original: Medevac Request
Key.Chinese: 醫療後送請求
Key.Chinesesimp: 医疗后送请求

Key.Original: A medevac request was registered and a new task was added. To complete the task, land close to the group leader and wait until the group gets in. Afterwards, transport the group to the medevac area at base.
Key.Chinese: 收到一個新的醫療後送請求，該任務已被新增。請前往指定地點接送該部隊。待全員上機後，運送他們前往基地中的醫療後送區域。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到一个新的医疗后送请求，该任务已被新增。请前往指定地点接送该部队。待全员上机后，运送他们前往基地中的医疗后送区域。

Key.Original: This is a medium priority task as the successful extraction of the affected group will free up the used Manpower by them, and allow another fresh group to join the battle.
Key.Chinese: 這是個中優先級別的任務，救援成功能使我們的人力資源回升，並使一隊新的戰力投入戰場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是个中优先级别的任务，救援成功能使我们的人力资源回升，并使一队新的战力投入战场。

Key.Original: Resupply Request
Key.Chinese: 運輸補給請求
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输补给请求

Key.Original: A resupply request was registered and a new task was added. To complete the task, sling load an ammo create stored at the maintenance area at the base and drop it close to the requested group leader.
Key.Chinese: 收到一個新的運輸補給請求，該任務已被新增。請先在基地的維護區之中掛載彈藥箱，並前往請求的小隊位置投放給他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到一个新的运输补给请求，该任务已被新增。请先在基地的维护区之中挂载弹药箱，并前往请求的小队位置投放给他们。

Key.Original: This is a medium priority task as soldiers without ammunition will not be effective on the battlefield.
Key.Chinese: 這是個中優先級別的任務，補給成功能使他們繼續在戰場上發揮效力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是个中优先级别的任务，补给成功能使他们继续在战场上发挥效力。

Key.Original: Score Increased
Key.Chinese: 增加分數
Key.Chinesesimp: 增加分数

Key.Original: Your %3Score%4 was just increased as a reward for completing a task, and you have directly contributed to your side's next %3Tactical Strike%4.
Key.Chinese: 你完成了一項任務，你的%3分數%4已被增加，並且你直接貢獻了團隊分數給下一個%3戰術打擊%4之用。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你完成了一项任务，你的%3分数%4已被增加，并且你直接贡献了团队分数给下一个%3战术打击%4之用。

Key.Original: Check the %3Tips%4 section for more information about %3Score%4 and %3Tactical Strikes%4.
Key.Chinese: 查看%3提示%4來獲得更多%3分數%4與%3戰術打擊%4的相關內容。
Key.Chinesesimp: 查看%3提示%4来获得更多%3分数%4与%3战术打击%4的相关内容。

Key.Original: Tactical Strikes
Key.Chinese: 戰術打擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 战术打击

Key.Original: Well done! A %3Tactical Strike%4 was just initiated by Headquarters.
Key.Chinese: 幹得好!總部已開始一項新的%3戰術打擊%4。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好!总部已开始一项新的%3战术打击%4。

Key.Original: The approximate location of the %3Tactical Strike% is marked on the map.
Key.Chinese: %3戰術打擊%4的概略位置已被標記在地圖上。
Key.Chinesesimp: %3战术打击%4的概略位置已被标记在地图上。

Key.Original: Transport Request
Key.Chinese: 運輸請求
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输请求

Key.Original: A transport request was registered and a new task was added. To complete the task, land close to the group leader and wait until the group gets in. Afterwards, transport the group to the designated sector (marked by the waypoint) %3OR%4 any other sector that is not under our control.
Key.Chinese: 收到一個新的運輸請求，該任務已被新增。前往指定地點接送隊伍。然後運輸部隊前往指定的佔領區(已標記在路徑點上)，%3或者%4其他任一個不是我們佔領的佔領區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到一个新的运输请求，该任务已被新增。前往指定地点接送队伍。然后运输部队前往指定的占领区(已标记在路径点上)，%3或者%4其他任一个不是我们占领的占领区。

Key.Original: This is the most common task. It has lower priority then the other tasks as the units can reach their destinations unassisted. Although, transport logistics can be of high tactical significance.
Key.Chinese: 這是個最普通的任務。他的優先級別小於其他任一任務，即使你不運送他們，他們也會自行前往該地點。然而由你親自運送的話，將能帶來更多的戰術優勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是个最普通的任务。他的优先级别小于其他任一任务，即使你不运送他们，他们也会自行前往该地点。然而由你亲自运送的话，将能带来更多的战术优势。

Key.Original: Selected by:
Key.Chinese: 執行的玩家:
Key.Chinesesimp: 执行的玩家:

Key.Original: There are 4 type of tasks, sorted by their strategic importance and Score that they reward you with: Close Air Support > Resupply > Medevac > Transport.
Key.Chinese: 有4種不同類型的任務，依戰略重要性與得分高低來做排列:密接空中支援>運輸補給>醫療後送>運輸。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有4种不同类型的任务，依战略重要性与得分高低来做排列:近距离空中支援>运输补给>医疗后送>运输。

Key.Original: Eagle
Dingo
Key.Chinese: 野狗
Key.Chinesesimp: 野狗

Key.Chinese: "November"
Key.Chinesesimp: "十一月"

Key.Chinesesimp: 螳螂

Key.Chinese: "主教"
Key.Chinesesimp: "主教"

Key.Chinese: 陌生人
Key.Chinesesimp: 陌生人

Key.Chinese: 毒蛇
Key.Chinesesimp: 毒蛇

Key.Original: Lizard
Key.Chinese: 蜥蜴
Key.Chinesesimp: 蜥蜴

Key.Original: Ghost
Key.Chinese: 鬼
Key.Chinesesimp: 幽灵

Key.Original: Ice
Key.Chinese: 冰
Key.Chinesesimp: 冰
